mapper.select: SELECT TCM.FIRST_NAME AS FIRST_NAME, TCM.LAST_NAME AS LAST_NAME, TCM.BUSINESS_NAME AS BUSINESS_NAME, TCM.CUSTOMER_TYPE AS MEMBER_TYPE, TCM.TITLE AS TITLE, TCM.PHONE_NO AS PHONE_NO, TCM.EMAIL AS EMAIL, LC.SR_NUMBER as srNumber, LC.DETAIL, LC.TYPE, LC.SUBTYPE, LC.PRIORITY, LC.STATUS, LC.CHANNEL, LC.OWNER, LC.SUBJECT, LC.DUE_DATE, LC.OPENED_DATE, LC.CLOSED_DATE, CB4.CODE_NAME AS divisionTypeName, LC.DIVISION_TYPE_CODE as divisionTypeCode, LC.CATEGORY_TYPE_CODE as categoryTypeCode, LC.SERVICE_AREA_CODE as serviceAreaCode, LC.WORK_NOTE as workNote, LC.INFORM_NAME as informName, LC.BU_ID, LC.CUSTOMER_ID, LC.CREATED_DATE, LC.CREATED_BY, LC.UPDATED_DATE, LC.UPDATED_BY, CONCAT(COALESCE(u1.FIRST_NAME,''), ' ',COALESCE(u1.LAST_NAME,'')) AS createdByName, CONCAT(COALESCE(u2.FIRST_NAME,''), ' ',COALESCE( u2.LAST_NAME,'')) AS updatedByName, CONCAT(USR.FIRST_NAME,' ',USR.LAST_NAME) AS displayName, CB1.CODE_NAME AS typeName, CB2.CODE_NAME AS subTypeName, CB3.CODE_NAME AS priorityName FROM TB_SR LC INNER JOIN TB_USER USR ON LC.OWNER = USR.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CODEBOOK CB1 ON LC.TYPE = CB1.CODE_ID AND CB1.CODE_TYPE = 'SR_TYPE' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CODEBOOK CB2 ON LC.SUBTYPE = CB2.CODE_ID AND CB2.CODE_TYPE = 'SR_SUBTYPE' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CODEBOOK CB3 ON LC.PRIORITY = CB3.CODE_ID AND CB3.CODE_TYPE = 'SR_PRIORITY' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CODEBOOK CB4 ON LC.DIVISION_TYPE_CODE = CB4.CODE_ID AND CB4.CODE_TYPE = 'SR_DIVISION' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CUSTOMER TCM ON LC.CUSTOMER_ID = TCM.CUSTOMER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_USER u1 ON LC.CREATED_BY = u1.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_USER u2 ON LC.UPDATED_BY = u2.ID WHERE (SR_NUMBER = #{srNumber}) limit 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_SR ( SR_NUMBER, CONSULTING_NUMBER, DIVISION_TYPE_CODE, TYPE, SUBTYPE, SERVICE_AREA_CODE, PRIORITY, STATUS, CHANNEL, SUBJECT, WORK_NOTE, INFORM_NAME, DETAIL, CONTACT_NAME, CUSTOMER_ID, OWNER, OPENED_DATE, CLOSED_DATE, BU_ID, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_BY, UPDATED_DATE, UPDATED_BY ) VALUES ( #{srNumber}, #{consultingNumber}, #{divisionTypeCode}, #{type}, #{subType}, #{serviceAreaCode}, #{priority}, #{status}, #{channel}, #{subject}, ,#{workNote} ,#{informName} #{detail}, #{contactName}, #{customerId}, #{owner}, NOW(), #{closedDate}, #{buId}, NOW(), #{createdBy}, NOW(), #{updatedBy} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_SR SET DIVISION_TYPE_CODE= #{divisionTypeCode}, TYPE = #{type}, SUBTYPE = #{subType}, PRIORITY = #{priority}, STATUS = #{status}, CHANNEL = #{channel}, DETAIL = #{detail}, SUBJECT = #{subject}, WORK_NOTE =#{workNote} , INFORM_NAME =#{informName}, OWNER = #{owner}, CLOSED_DATE = CASE WHEN (#{status} = '04') THEN NOW() ELSE NULL END, BU_ID = #{buId}, UPDATED_DATE = NOW(), UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy} WHERE (SR_NUMBER = #{srNumber})
